rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A spacious entry area aligned with the positive Vastu entrance.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Art Deco styled open-plan living and kitchen combined, featuring geometric patterns and rich textures.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with an attached ensuite bathroom, placed in the northeast quadrant to maximize positive energy.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Guest bedroom adjacent to Master Bedroom, designed for convenience and privacy.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Common bathroom facilities for guests, located conveniently near the guest bedroom.

openings.description: Large entrance door to welcome positive energy according to Vastu principles.

openings.location: living area, east and north walls
openings.description: Windows placed in accordance with Vastu for natural light optimization.

elements.name: Rooftop Terrace
elements.description: A leisure terrace with Art Deco design elements and a view over the pool area.

features.description: Outdoor swimming pool integrated with the terrace, providing relaxation space and aesthetic harmony.
Seating area around the pool, enhancing social interactions.
